title: Storyline-Based Microlearning to Strengthen Consistency in Scientific Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level science fundamentals, experimental design, and data analysis experience
context.additional_context: 10-minute modular learning accessible via smartphones, customized scientific problem-solving scenarios for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can develop a three-stage or higher explanatory model by connecting scientific phenomena through a storyline-based approach in response to inquiry questions.
Learners can analyze phenomenon-based materials provided in mobile environments and draft at least one experimental design document.
Learners can evaluate the scientific claim-evidence-reasoning structure with 80% accuracy through peer assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
